controls.title: Pizzeria Setup
controls.name: Name
controls.pizzaInfoHtml: Choose how many topping options you offer and which recommendation strategies to try.
controls.uploadInfoHtml: Please use the sample algorithm on GitHub in the “Example Algorithm” folder.

algoInfo.greedy:
Greedy

  • Always picks the currently best-known action (highest estimated value).
  • Pro: fully exploits known information.
  • Con: no exploration → can get stuck in a local optimum.
  • Estimate update: incremental mean of observed rewards.
algoInfo.epsilon_greedy:
Epsilon-Greedy

  • With probability ε explore randomly; otherwise exploit greedily.
  • Parameter: ε in [0,1] (e.g. 0.1).
  • Trade-off: exploration vs. exploitation.
  • Good simple, robust default.
algoInfo.ucb1:
UCB1 (Upper Confidence Bound)

  • Pick action with estimate + uncertainty bonus.
  • Intuition: favors good means and under-sampled actions.
  • Formula (simplified): mean_i + sqrt(2 * ln(t) / n_i)
  • Very effective on stationary bandits.
algoInfo.thompson:
Thompson Sampling

  • Bayesian: sample from posterior distributions (e.g., Beta for Bernoulli).
  • Natural balance between exploration & exploitation.
  • Often fast convergence and strong practical performance.
